CustomField.formula:
IF ( OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Request"), RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'NDA', OR( $User.Id = OwnerId, CONTAINS($Label.CLM_Profiles, $Profile.Name)), $Permission.CLM_Contract_Manager_Permission), AND( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Request"), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'NDA', ISPICKVAL(CLM_Qualifies_for_Self_Service__c, "No"), OR( $User.Id = OwnerId, CONTAINS($Label.CLM_Profiles, $Profile.Name)), $Permission.CLM_Contract_Manager_Permission)),
IF(OR($User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4d', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4t', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4u'), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__LightningSelectTemplate?id=" &Id & "&action=Preview_Agreement&templateType=Agreement", IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_Preview", "Preview"),"_self"), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__SelectTemplate?id=" &Id & "&action=Preview_Agreement&templateType=Agreement", IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_Preview", "Preview"),"_self")), NULL)
CustomField.label: Preview_Custom
